mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS courseId, c.name AS courseName, t.name AS teacherName, COUNT(e.id) AS enrollmentCount FROM course c LEFT JOIN teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.id LEFT JOIN enrollment e ON c.id = e.course_id GROUP BY c.id, c.name, t.name
SELECT s.id AS studentId, s.name AS studentName, s.student_no AS studentNo FROM enrollment e JOIN student s ON e.student_id = s.id WHERE e.course_id = #{courseId}
